text: She tied the knot with her husband on April 28 last year. But the wedded bliss was short - lived for Australian actress Claire Holt, as her beau Matthew Kaplan filed for divorce just one day shy of their first anniversary. In court papers filed on April 27, TV producer Matthew cited irreconcilable differences for the split. Splitsville : Australian actress Claire Holt is set to divorce from her husband Matthew Kaplan Claire, 28, has since responded to the filing on May 2 and requested to take back her maiden name. And Brisbane - born Claire claims the couple split on April 27, while her husband believes they separated three days earlier. Known for her role in The Vampire Diaries's spin - off show, The Originals, Claire first announced her engagement to Matthew in July 2015. Bad timing? Court documents show Matthew
